text: Stanley Joseph Rodger (13 February 1940 â€“ 29 May 2022) was a New Zealand politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He was president of the Public Service Association between 1970 and 1973 and Member of Parliament for Dunedin North from 1978 to 1990. Rodger was the Minister of Labour from 1984 until 1989. Rodger was born in Dunedin, New Zealand. Rodger died on 29 May 2022 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Stan Rodger
